file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-76-01-04 - BAGGAGE-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL BAGGAGE-DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the baggage-door warning microswitches. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICRO- ALL 52-76-01-000-801-A SWITCHES - REMOVAL BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICRO- ALL 52-76-01-400-801-A SWITCHES - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-76-01 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-76-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the baggage-door warning microswitch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-05/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 271 813 Cargo compartment - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cargo compartment - LH I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the cargo-compartment lining panels ( AMM MPP 06-41-05/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the electrical connections. (2) Remove the screw and washer of the clamp. (3) Remove the screws (1) and washers (2) of the support (5) attach of fuselage. (4) Remove the assembly support (5) and microswitch (6). (5) Remove the screws (3), nuts (4) of the microswitch (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-76-01 Page 2 of 5 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Warning Microswitch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 FORWARD MICROSWITCH OF BAGGAGE DOOR B A ZONE 813 2 5 1 C DET. A REAR MICROSWITCH OF BAGGAGE DOOR 6 1 2 4 3 1 5 2 1 3 DET. C 6 2 4 1 DET. B 145AMM520118.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-76-01 Page 3 of 5 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-76-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the baggage-door warning microswitch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - OP- AMM TASK 52-76-01-700-801-A/500 ERATIONAL TEST BAGGAGE DOOR WARNING MICROSWITCHES - AD- AMM TASK 52-76-01-820-801-A/500 JUSTMENT C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 271 813 Cargo compartment - LH D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS20995C Lockwire AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cargo compartment - LH I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the microswitch (6) on the support (5). (2) Install the screws (3) and nuts (4 ) of the microswitch (6). (3) Put the washer (2) and screws (1) of support (5) attachment of fuselage. (4) Install the clamp with washer and screw. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-76-01 Page 4 of 5 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Make the electrical connections of the microswitch (6). (6) Make sure correct functional the microswitch ( AMM TASK 52-76-01-700-801-A/500). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do an operational test ( AMM TASK 52-76-01-700-801-A/500) and adjustment ( AMM TASK 52-76-01-820-801-A/500) of the microswitches of the baggage door warning system. (2) Close the baggage door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-76-01 Page 5 of 5 Rev 54 - Apr 27/18 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
